params._LPTokenAmount: (uint256) - amount of the ERC-20 LP token to stake in order to participate
params._endTime: (uint256) - block number at which the tournament ends
params._poolIncentivized: (address) - address of the pool to incentivize and from which we will accept the LP token
params._rewardAmount: (uint256) - amount of the ERC-20 token to fund the prize
params._rewardToken: (address) - address of the ERC-20 token used as prize for the players
params._startTime: (uint256) - block number at which the tournament starts

createTournament(string,address,address,.notice: Function that allows anyone to deploy a new tournament contract

getAllActiveTournaments().notice: Function that returns an array of all the active tournament contracts

getAllFutureTournaments().notice: Function that returns an array of all the future tournament contracts

getAllPastTournaments().notice: Function that returns an array of all the past tournament contracts

getAllTournaments().notice: Function that returns an array of all the tournament contracts

getTournamentsByPlayer(address).notice: Function that returns an array of all the tournament a player is registered to

isTournament(address).notice: Function that returns true if the contract is a deployed tournament, false otherwise

joinTournament(uint256).notice: Function that allows anyone to join a tournament
